content: Sure, I can summarize the Semester-based notes page in a paragraph. Once the user selects a branch from the Browser page, they will be directed to the home page of Semesters. This page will have all the semester buttons on the left side, and the 5th semester will be the home page. The center of the page will contain the subjects of the 5th semester, and the user can click on any subject to access its notes. The notes will be categorized into units and topics to make it easy for the user to navigate and find the required information. The page will have a clean and user-friendly design, and the notes will be presented in an organized and readable format. Users can also leave comments and reviews on the notes to help others in their studies. Overall, the Semester-based notes page will provide a valuable resource for students to access high-quality study material in an easy and organized manner.
